mapper.select: SELECT p.user_no, t.service_type_code, c.code_name, t.use_yn, t.price FROM tbl_petsitter_profile p INNER JOIN tbl_service_type t ON p.user_no = t.user_no INNER JOIN tbl_common_code c ON t.service_type_code = c.code WHERE p.user_no = #{userNo}

SELECT p.user_no, s.skill_type_code, c.code_name, s.use_yn FROM tbl_petsitter_profile p INNER JOIN tbl_petsitter_skill s ON p.user_no = s.user_no INNER JOIN tbl_common_code c ON s.skill_type_code = c.code WHERE p.user_no = #{userNo}

SELECT p.user_no, k.pet_type_code, c.code_name, k.use_yn FROM tbl_petsitter_profile p INNER JOIN tbl_service_petkinds k ON p.user_no = k.user_no INNER JOIN tbl_common_code c ON k.pet_type_code = c.code WHERE p.user_no = #{userNo}

SELECT /*+ index_desc(tbl_petsitter_profile) */ ps.user_no, TO_CHAR(sc.service_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as service_date FROM tbl_petsitter_profile ps INNER JOIN tbl_service_calendar sc on ps.user_no = sc.user_no WHERE ps.user_no = #{userNo}
SELECT p.user_no, a.photo_no, a.act_photo, a.file_name FROM tbl_petsitter_profile p INNER JOIN tbl_activity_photo a ON p.user_no = a.user_no WHERE p.user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_petsitter_profile (user_no, pro_photo, introduce, reg_user_no, reg_date) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{proPhoto}, #{introduce}, #{userNo}, current_date)
INSERT INTO tbl_service_calendar (user_no, service_date, reg_user_no, reg_date) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{serviceDate}, #{userNo}, current_date)

INSERT INTO tbl_activity_photo (user_no, photo_no, act_photo, reg_user_no, reg_date, file_name) VALUES (#{userNo}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(photo_no),0)+1 FROM tbl_activity_photo WHERE user_no = #{userNo}), #{actPhoto}, #{userNo}, current_date,#{fileName})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_petsitter_profile SET pro_photo = #{proPhoto}, introduce = #{introduce}, mod_user_no = #{userNo}, mod_date = current_date WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
UPDATE tbl_service_calendar SET service_date = #{serviceDate}, mod_user_no = #{userNo}, mod_date = current_date WHERE user_no = #{userNo}

MERGE INTO tbl_service_type USING DUAL ON (user_no = #{userNo} and service_type_code = #{serviceTypeCode}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET use_yn = #{useYn}, price = #{price} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (user_no, service_type_code, use_yn, price, reg_user_no, reg_date) VALUES( #{userNo},#{serviceTypeCode},#{useYn},#{price},#{userNo},current_date )

MERGE INTO tbl_petsitter_skill USING DUAL ON (user_no = #{userNo} and skill_type_code = #{skillTypeCode}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET use_yn = #{useYn} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (user_no, skill_type_code, use_yn, reg_user_no, reg_date) VALUES( #{userNo},#{skillTypeCode},#{useYn},#{userNo},current_date )

MERGE INTO tbl_service_petkinds USING DUAL ON (user_no = #{userNo} and pet_type_code = #{petTypeCode}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET use_yn = #{useYn} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (user_no, pet_type_code, use_yn, reg_user_no, reg_date) VALUES( #{userNo},#{petTypeCode},#{useYn},#{userNo},current_date )
